Fazlullah 's efforts to control the infighting suffered a setback when the central Shura rejected one his key appointments in South Waziristan , Taliban sources said on Monday .
Last week , he replaced Khan Sajna in the district after weeks of bloody fighting .

But not only Sjna but also the central Shura rejected the replacement , what seems to be the most formidable challenge to his authority since appointment as rebel boss last year after his predecessor Hakimullah was killed in drone attack .
